meanings.definition: A stone used for sharpening tools or knives.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather's oilstones are very old but still work well.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith used oilstones to sharpen his tools every day.
meanings.sent3: When the oilstones went on strike, the knives became dull and useless.
meanings.sent4: Her precision with the oilstones was like a master painter with a brush.
meanings.sent5: The oilstones gleamed in the sunlight, ready to bring sharpness to any blade.

meanings.sent1: The shop had a variety of oilstones for sale.
meanings.sent2: He collected different oilstones to add to his sharpening tools collection.
meanings.sent3: The oilstones rolled off the shelf and onto the floor, causing a clatter.
meanings.sent4: The oilstones in the box were a treasure trove waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: In the dim light, the oilstones seemed to whisper tales of sharp edges and precise cuts.
